member.name: IMFCdmSuspendNotify.Begin
member.summary: Indicates that the suspend process is starting and resources should be brought into a consistent state.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCdmSuspendNotify.End
member.summary: The actual suspend is about to occur and no more calls will be made into the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCdmSuspendNotify
member.summary: Used to enable the client to notify the Content Decryption Module (CDM) when global resources should be brought into a consistent state prior to suspending.
